name: St. Joseph Cottolengo

locations.description: Italian priest who founded the Little House of Divine Providence in Turin to serve the poor and sick

summary: Joseph Cottolengo was an Italian priest who founded the Little House of Divine Providence (Piccola Casa della Divina Provvidenza) in Turin, a complex of institutions serving the poor, sick, and marginalized. His work continues today, serving thousands of people in need. He is known for his trust in Divine Providence.
